job.title: Software Development Engineer - AWS
job.description: stronguDescriptionbrbrustrongEver wondered how a company like Amazon AWS was able to grow so quickly The Enterprise Engineering team is the key component making it all possible We are the core to unlocking all the products services and tools being used securely and reliably within corporate resources communicating with one another and in collaboration with our AWS customers We build diverse services ranging from global identity services to critical datacenter infrastructure to customerfacing software meeting demands for cuttingedge AWS technology and pioneering and what it means to scale optimallybrbrOver 900K Amazonians and variable staff rely on our products in 35 regions 472 corporate offices more than 350 fulfillment centers and over 900 total Amazon locations including logistics centers and physical retail storesbrbrWe are a builder organization and take pride in resilience and security in our services We have a broad portfolio that we manage through our guiding principles When services throughout Amazon need an Amazonians identity to grant access to resources they call on our identity and authentication services which include Amazon NT ANT Amazons LDAP Directory LDAP and Amazon Federate LDAP supports identity and infrastructure needs in 35 regions contains 22M objects and handles 15B search operations each monthbrOur collaboration products include a multitude of products such as email SharePoint Slack telecom for inboundoutbound calling and emergency services and products to facilitate rich inperson and remote meetings Our Amazon Oncall and paging solutions allow all Amazon builders support their services and quickly respond to incidents On an annual basis we deliver 12B emails schedule over 7M meetings connect 60M phone calls manage oncall rotations for more than 17K teams and deliver 18M pages Our client patch compliance services eg Amazon Client Management Engine manage 486K Windows Linux Ubuntu and Mac desktops and laptops keeping current with patch releases at lightning speed which no other organization in the world can compare tobrEnterprise Engineering drives the Unfabric program leading the way to zero trust networks inside Amazon and enabling Amazonians to access corporate resources with a zero trust model We built Amazon Enterprise Access AEA Today AEA provides offCORP access to Amazon services for 42K iOS and Android mobile devices and 486K AEAready laptops Working from home or on devices with secure access to internal programs is become easier and easier and our teams are pioneering this technologybrbrEnterprise Engineering also supports workloads central to the operation of our AWS datacenters This includes services like H2C that provides a real time registry of all Amazons servers playing a central role in the provisioning of new capacity for Amazon services It also includes services for network time NTP configuration management CMF and DHCPbrOur vision for the future of Enterprise Engineering is to define and deliver a new enterprise strategy for Amazon driven by greater needs for Amazonians to be productive and collaborate with each other in more flexible ways constantly being tested and driven at an incomparable level and scale of Amazon Web ServicesbrbrIn the software engineering role your experience will become involved with the highest priorities includingbrulli Continuous development of distributed multitiered systems algorithms and relational amp NoSQL databaseslili Design patterns data structures in test driven environment with projects on UI and server sidelili Developing endpoint client software with design for scalability performance and reliabilitylili Developing and publishing SOA service oriented architecture applicationslili Fleet provisioning and configuration management at scale OR CICD pipeline build processes OR building services using AWS products  working in a high pace DevOps mindset culturelili Contributing to automation efforts for a team advancing the service ownership culturelili Completely embracing the entire AWS ecosystem and driving innovations on top of itlili Instilling in a culture that drives DevOps holds a highquality bar with code reviews drives automation efforts to empower and removes barriers for your teamlili Building services that can scale across hundreds of thousands clients used by Amazonians worldwidelili Maintaining current technical knowledge of rapidly changing technology always on the lookout for new technologies and working with leaders of development teams to evolve current processeslili Working with others on the engineering team to participate in daytoday development activities contributing to architecture decisions participating in designs design reviews and implementationlili Building services that can scale across hundreds of thousands clients used by Amazonians worldwidelili Maintaining current technical knowledge of rapidly changing technology always on the lookout for new technologies and working with leaders of development teams to evolve current processesbrbrliulstronguBasic Qualificationsbrustrongulli 2 years of noninternship professional software development experiencelili Programming experience with at least one modern language such as Java C or C including objectoriented designlili 1 years of experience contributing to the architecture and design architecture design patterns reliability and scaling of new and current systemsbrliulPOOLINGbrbrstronguPreferred Qualificationsbrustrongulli Excellent written and verbal communication skillslili Programming experience with at least one modern language such as Java C or C including objectoriented designlili Solid software development background including design patterns data structures test driven developmentlili Experience with distributed multitiered systems algorithms and relational amp NoSQL databaseslili Experience with fleet provisioning and configuration management at scalelili Experience with CICD pipeline build processeslili Experience building services using AWS productslili Experience working in a high pace DevOps mindset culturelili
